TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Unicode/SpecialCase extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: SpecialCase represents language-specific case mappings such as Turkish.
Docs.remarks: Methods of SpecialCase customize (by overriding) the standard mappings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int32 ToLower(unsigned int32 rune) cil managed

Docs.summary: ToLower maps the rune to lower case giving priority to the special mapping.
Docs.returns: The lower cased rune if it can be.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int32 ToTitle(unsigned int32 rune) cil managed

Docs.summary: ToTitle maps the rune to title case giving priority to the special mapping.
Docs.returns: The title cased rune if it can be.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int32 ToUpper(unsigned int32 rune) cil managed

Docs.summary: ToUpper maps the rune to upper case giving priority to the special mapping.
Docs.returns: The upper cased rune if it can be.
